com.rpgcraft.data

Class ExtendedPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rpgcraft.data.ExtendedPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraftforge.common.IExtendedEntityProperties

    public class ExtendedPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.minecraftforge.common.IExtendedEntityProperties
    Allows for the player object holding extra data. A lot of this code is borrowed from a tutorial and needs to be refined for our mod.
    Author:
    Nicholas Wollmann
